comments.author: 小明
comments.text: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!

comments.author: 小强
comments.text: You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you

comments.author: 小兵
comments.text: Even the greatest was once a beginner. Don't be afraid to take that first step.

comments.author: 拉登
comments.text: You are afraid to die, and you're afraid to live. What a way to exist.
